title: See anger pouring onto Moscow streets after Navalny sentencing
description: CNN's Matthew Chance reports on the protests in Russia after a Moscow court sentenced Putin critic Alexey Navalny to two and a half years in jail.

title: Kremlin critic Navalny mocks 'Putin the Poisoner' as he gets jailed again
description: Kremlin critic Alexey Navalny appeared in a Moscow court on Tuesday in a bizarre and heated hearing in which the politician ridiculed suggestions he should have communicated with parole officers while he was in a coma.

title: See what Republican lawmakers are saying about Marjorie Taylor Greene
description: Republican lawmakers, including Sen. Mitch McConnell (R-KY), are speaking out about Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) after she spread conspiracies.

title: Why many Black Americans are hesitant to get Covid-19 vaccine
description: CNN's Ryan Young explains why many Black Americans are hesitant to take the Covid-19 vaccine and the historical significance behind this reluctance.

title: This is how Amazon's Jeff Bezos spends his immense wealth
description: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos is one of the richest people in the world. Between space endeavors, a newspaper and charity, here's how he spends his fortune.

title: Spot the robot's new arm lets it jump rope (and do serious stuff)
description: Boston Dynamic's Spot robot got a whole toolkit of improvements from an arm that can lift 11 pounds to thermal imaging video cameras. The dog-like robot can now swing a jump rope and draw with chalk too.

title: Dark matter halo found around ancient 'cannibal' galaxy
description: Space is a violent place, strewn with galaxies that have cannibalized each other to survive. Some of these survivors are galactic fossils, revealing glimpses of the past because they formed in the early universe.

title: Captain Tom Moore, UK fundraising hero, dies at 100
description: Captain Tom Moore, the 100-year-old World War II veteran whose efforts to raise millions for the UK's National Health Service made him a universally adored icon during the first wave of the Covid-19 outbreak, has died after contracting the disease, his family said on February 2.

title: Dubai cracks down on tourism industry as Covid-19 cases surge
description: Dubai is cracking down on their hospitality industry as Covid-19 cases surge in the popular vacation destination. CNN's John Defterios reports.

title: Axios reporter describes Trump meeting: 'Almost ended in a physical fight'
description: Axios reporter Jonathan Swan describes a December 18 meeting between President Donald Trump, White House officials and conspiracy theorists that ended in a profanity-laced shouting match.

title: Analysis: Why McConnell chose this moment to condemn Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene
description: Nothing Mitch McConnell does is without a significant amount of thinking and strategy behind it. It's why he's in his seventh term representing Kentucky in the Senate -- and why he has been the chamber's leading Republican for more than a decade.

title: Soccer coach sacked over rape comments during interview
description: Stuart Baxter has been sacked from his position as manager by Indian Super League club Odisha after making comments about rape during a post-match interview.

title: Biden to sign immigration executive orders and establish task force to reunite separated families
description: President Joe Biden will sign three executive orders Tuesday that take aim at his predecessor's hardline immigration policies and try to rectify the consequences of those policies, including by establishing a task force designed to reunite families separated at the US-Mexico border, according to senior administration officials.

title: 5 ways to replace food rewards for fitness motivation
description: Healthy milestones offer a moment to celebrate victories, no matter how small.

title: What's your gender? I prefer not to say
description: When it comes to filling out a form, I can write my name and address and birth date on autopilot without pause. But when I get to the gender question, a wave of anxiety washes over.

title: CNN reporter on Navalny hearing: Police presence is suffocating
description: CNN's Fred Pleitgen reports from outside court as Russian opposition campaigner Alexey Navalny appears for a hearing. The hearing will determine whether Navalny will face jail time for allegedly violating terms of a suspended sentence over 2014 fraud claims.

title: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez says she's a survivor of sexual assault while describing trauma of insurrection
description: Democratic Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez said during an Instagram Live broadcast Monday night that she is a survivor of sexual assault.

title: A powerful winter storm blanketed parts of the US -- and more snow is expected
description: A fierce winter storm has been pounding the Northeast and mid-Atlantic states, prompting emergency declarations, blanketing neighborhoods under several feet of snow and shutting down vaccination sites as officials urge residents to prepare for more dangerous weather Tuesday.

title: 'The most special thing I've done': Two world-class climbers scale the tallest chimney in Europe
description: Soaring 360 meters into the sky, the Trbovlje Power Station in Slovenia is home to Europe's tallest chimney.

title: Alibaba prepares to face investors as crackdown in China intensifies
description: Alibaba is coming off what was likely a big quarter for its e-commerce business. But China's most famous tech firm is still poised to face nervous investors on Tuesday as a regulatory crackdown in China continues to cast a shadow over its future.

title: Japan plans to extend its state of emergency as Covid-19 cases rise
description: Japan plans to extend its state of emergency in Tokyo, Osaka and eight other prefectures as the country continues to battle rising Covid-19 cases, Prime Minister Yoshihide Suga said Tuesday.

title: Anger and anxiety over what's to come after military detained Aung San Suu Kyi and other democratically-elected leaders
description: The streets of Myanmar's largest city, Yangon, appeared outwardly calm Tuesday morning, as residents made their way to work a day after the military detained Aung San Suu Kyi and other democratically-elected leaders and seized control of the country.

title: Taiwan authorities revoke quarantine fine for man after discovering he was kidnapped
description: Taiwanese authorities said they will no longer fine a man for breaking quarantine because investigators discovered he was kidnapped in an unfortunate case of mistaken identity.

title: Here's how Jared Kushner and Stacey Abrams got nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize
description: On its face, being nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize is a prettay, prettay big deal. Most people -- myself included -- have never been nominated.

title: Anger and anxiety over what's to come following Myanmar's coup
The pandemic is still dwarfing the size of Washington's efforts to fight it
description: The long war against Covid-19, ever more daunting in the dispiriting months of winter, is now posing a fundamental question over whether the US has the political, economic and national will to prevail before the disaster gets much worse.

title: Georgia police chief and officer pushed out over racist, misogynist remarks caught on camera at BLM rally
description: The police chief and a patrolman in a small Georgia town have been pushed out of their jobs after they were caught having a racist, misogynist conversation while preparing to patrol a Black Lives Matter Rally in June 2020, according to Buddy Walker, an assistant to Hamilton Mayor Julie Brown.

title: This is job one for Biden in the climate debate
description: President Joe Biden's push to accelerate the nation's transition toward electric vehicles offers him a game-changing opportunity to jolt the climate change debate -- if he can quell simmering tension between two key elements of the Democratic coalition.

title: Former QAnon follower explains why she left the movement
description: A former follower of the QAnon movement tells CNN's Don Lemon how she came to believe in the movement and ultimately decided to leave.

title: K-pop star apologizes for flirty pictures with Nazi mannequin
description: K-pop star Sowon has apologized via her management team after posting photos of herself posing with a mannequin dressed as a Nazi soldier on her Instagram page.

title: A college student made big bucks off GameStop stock. Now he's donating video games to a children's hospital
description: After making thousands off GameStop stock last week, a 20-year-old college student used his newfound riches to pay it forward to a local children's hospital.

title: McConnell rebukes congresswoman
description:
• Democrats move swiftly to strip Marjorie Taylor Greene of committee assignments
• 'Tell everyone what you told me': Mother of Parkland victim to GOP lawmaker

title: Barstool CEO on why Robinhood story goes 'beyond business'
description: Founder and president of Barstool Sports Dave Portnoy tells CNN's Chris Cuomo that "things just don't add up" after the stock-trading app Robinhood barred traders from buying shares of GameStop.

title: McConnell: Marjorie Taylor Greene's views are a 'cancer' for the GOP
Analysis: Myanmar will test Biden's commitment to defending global democracy
description: Myanmar's military coup is a tragedy for a people who have enjoyed fragile freedom after decades of darkness under dictatorship. It also marks the failure of an effort by the United States and its allies to instill democracy and to draw the country out of China's orbit.

title: Silver is surging but users on WallStreetBets say they're not behind the rally
description: The silver market is the latest flashpoint in the Reddit mania that took over Wall Street last week.

title: Investigators recommend no charges for officer accused of killing rioter during Capitol insurrection
description: Investigators have recommended that prosecutors decline to bring charges against a US Capitol Police officer in the shooting of a pro-Trump rioter who was killed during the insurrection, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: 255 restaurants, 37 Michelin stars: Meet the American who spent a year eating his way through Singapore
description: No one wants to be stuck in a foreign country during a global pandemic.

title: What triggered the coup in Myanmar
You'll never guess who's on Cameo
description: Punxsutawney Phil will personally wish you a happy birthday for $99. CNN's Jeanne Moos reports.

title: Liz Cheney gets boost from McConnell amid battle over Trump's impeachment
description: Rep. Liz Cheney, under fire from former President Donald Trump and his staunchest defenders, is picking up support from some influential Republicans as her allies close ranks and resist the effort to oust her from the third-ranking spot in House GOP leadership.

title: Europe struggles to overcome vaccine shortfall
description: Europe struggles with a coronavirus vaccine shortfall amid Brexit tensions. CNN's Nic Robertson reports.
